harnessRequest.name: Call test harness #4
harnessRequest.description: Call test harness #4 which is hardwired to throw an exception. This confirms baseline for holodeck's harness factory's handling of bad developer input.

testMessage4.thisIsOpqaue: so i can do wahtever i want... and it doesn't matter anyway. the harness is hard-wired to explode.
